step_feedback.feedback: You did a great job stretching your arm overhead and feeling the resistance. Keep up the good work!
Your hand opening was good. Try to open your fingers even wider next time to maximize the pumping action.
Making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles was well executed. Remember to really squeeze!
Opening your hand while exhaling and relaxing was good. Focus on a full, relaxed exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and open your fingers wide. Squeeze your fist tightly as you inhale, then relax as you exhale to help move fluid.
